item.title: Checking changelogs with zypper
item.author: zoltan.balogh@suse.com (Zoltán Balogh)
item.description: I have heard way to often the question from Linux and specially SUSE Linux users that “How can I check the changelog of a package or new version of a package available on the repository, but not yet installed”. There was no easy answer for that question, so I have decided to make a little tool for that. How it is done All the enabled repositories have a bunch of configuration files in a well structured directory tree under the /var/cache/zypp/raw/.
